text: The Infinite Hidden Markov Model ( IHMM ) extends hidden Markov models to have a countably infinite number of hidden states ( Beal et al . , 2002 ; Teh et al . , 2006 ) .We present a generalization of this framework that introduces nearly block - diagonal structure in the transitions between the hidden states , where blocks correspond to " subbehaviors " exhibited by data sequences .
